B

BCPlayerControls - Class in com.brightcove.mobile.android
BCPlayerControls represents the fixed playback controls for the BCPlayerView in the Brightcove Android Player SDK.

Basic constructor to handle a given AttributeSet.
BCPlayerControls(Context) - Constructor for class com.brightcove.mobile.android.BCPlayerControls
Basic constructor to setup the BCPlayerControls view given a Context.
BCPlayerControls.MediaPlayerControl - Interface in com.brightcove.mobile.android
Represents contract between player controls and BCPlayerView.
BCPlayerView - Class in com.brightcove.mobile.android
Displays a video file.
BCPlayerView(Context) - Constructor for class com.brightcove.mobile.android.BCPlayerView
 
BCPlayerView(Context, AttributeSet) - Constructor for class com.brightcove.mobile.android.BCPlayerView

BCPlayerView.OnPlaybackChangeListener - Interface in com.brightcove.mobile.android
Definition of callbacks that are invoked on changes to the playback state of the BCPlayerView.
BCSurfaceView - Class in com.brightcove.mobile.android
A lightweight extension to SurfaceView to accommodate setting exact video sizes via the setVideoSize() public method.
BCSurfaceView(Context) - Constructor for class com.brightcove.mobile.android.BCSurfaceView
